open.description: Whether the snackbar is currently open.

closeOnEscape.description: Whether the snackbar closes when it is focused and the user presses the ESC key. Defaults to false.

timeoutMs.description: Automatic dismiss timeout in milliseconds. Value must be between 4000 and 10000 (or -1 to disable the timeout completely) or an error will be thrown. Defaults to 5000 (5 seconds).

labelText.description: The text content of the label element.
